function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:47 UTC – Details)

From the brand

HARDELL is a professional tools manufacturer. Whether you are a professional craftsman, a DIY enthusiast, or a modeling enthusiast in need of precision gadgets and miniature tools, HARDELL’s tools can help you.

Mini Cordless Rotary Tool

Rotary Tool Kits

Rotary Tool & Engraver

【Multipurpose Rotary Tool Set】The high-performance and low-noise rotary tool combined with 55 most popular power rotary tool accessories for DIY fine work, Not for Heavy-duty Projects. Whenever you think of carving, sanding, grinding, polishing or cutting, you’ll find this electric rotary unit is a must for creating your resin crafts. Owning one is like having a whole toolbox
【5-Speed Setting】The cordless rotary tool can realize 5-speed adjustment(5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM),which makes it easier to adjust to a suitable speed to meet the power demand in different scenarios. It allows you to sand in stages safely and carefully. Even people without any experience can easily get started and control the speed easily. Micro rotary tool make your creation handy
【Compact Lightweight】Powerful but small and light, just like holding a pen while in use, for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort
【Quick USB Charging, Longer Running Time】Rotary tool cordless comes with 3.7V rechargeable battery, can work continuously for 200 minutes. One charge can be used for multiple times, and the range is stress-free. Battery powered rotary tool make your work one after another. (The indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged)
【Rotary Drill with LED Indicator】The upgraded small cordless rotary tool has a blind spot lighting LED design. Reduce backlight shadows and overcome the adverse effects of dark areas on the use of the drill for resin, and provide you with a better experience


HARDELL MINI Rotary Tool is lightweight and small, you can carry it with you. It is suitable for different DIY working situation

  • Product Features：

  1. Cordless design: Cordless design of the rotary tool allows use anywhere without the need for an electrical outlet.
  2. USB Charging: Equipped with a USB power cord, making charging easier and more convenient.
  3. Spindle Lock: Onboard spindle lock makes for quick and easy bit changes.
  4. Variable Speed Tool: With 5 different levels of RPM, which can be adjusted among 5000 to 15000 RPM.
  5. Easy-to-use: You can grip it like a pen for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort. Ergonomic streamlined design with over-load power-off protection for safe and reliable operation.

  • Application：

Fit for grinding pet nails and detailed works like sanding, polishing, carving, cutting.

  • Product Contents：

3.7v Cordless Rotary Tool and 55 Accessories(include USB)


Cordless Rotary Tool with 55 pcs Accessories

What you will get:

  • Cordless Rotary Tool x1
  • Sanding Bands x28
  • Grinding Bits x5+ Diamond Bits x5
  • Collets x6 + Mandrels x2
  • Polishing Wheels x2 + Twist Drill Bit x4 + Cutting Disc x2
  • Accessories Case x2
  • USB Cable x1
Warning

  1. Not for Heavy-duty Projects
  2. Do not press the lock button until the tool fully stops, or it may cause damage or even injury.
  3. Please refer to the instruction manual for a detailed operation guide.

Very useful for arts and crafts projects and small home repairs and are excellent for working in small or hard-to-reach spaces

Specifications

  • 1. Rating: 3.7V
  • 2. 5-Speed: 5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM (no load)
  • 3. Color: Orange
  • 4. Collet Size: 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.4/3.0/3.2mm diameter
  • 5. Charging Port: Micro USB
  • 6. Tool Weight: 0.135kg
  • 7. Tool Size: 3.4*17.5CM

Read more





5 Rotation Speed

5 Rotation Speed controlled, you can make the speed control finely by adjusting the tool to better complete the job.

USB Charging

Rechargeable via supplied compatible USB connector at any place, more convenience for your charging. Full charging time is about 2-4 hours, and the indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged.

Easy to Use

The cordless tool with 7 different sizes compatible collet and spindle lock allows you to quickly and easily change accessories on Rotary tools. (Please make sure the bits are fixed in the rotary tool every time)

Light & Small

Powerful but small and light, like holding a pen when using.

Read more

Installation Instructions


Application




Sanding

Sanding belts and sanding discs can help your handmade crafts become smoother and smooth out the uneven surface of crafts. Such as steel rust, paint and rough wooden boards can be removed by the sanding rotary tool.

Carving

It is very easy to use for accurate DIY craft engraving on glass, wood, metal, plastic, mirrors, and other materials. You can engrave any pattern you like to create a unique gift for your family and friends.

Drilling

This Cordless Rotary Tool can be used for diamond drilling. Different sizes of drill bits and special cutting heads allow you to work easily on wood.

Read more




Polishing

Mini Rotary tools can help you remove rust from some metal surfaces. polishing Wheel and Abrasive Stone are suitable for polishing various materials. Reduce the surface roughness of the product to make its surface bright and flat.

Grinding

You can easily remove rust and polish the metal surface of the object to make the handwork more perfect.

Cutting

Suitable for cutting only light and small projects. Easy to cut plastics, wood, housings, and aluminum brass, etc.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:29 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Starting with DIY family, GoGonova has been growing fast and challenging the traditional path of power tools.

Powered by the wave of Smart Home, we are keen to linking every of our DIY lovers with smart tools in a simple manner.

Our vision is to empower the imagnation through continuous innovation of our technology!

GoGonova Hot Glue Gun&Heat Gun

DIYer’s Choices

Multi-purposed Tool

【3 Adjustable Speeds】- GoGonova cordless rotary tool can realize 3 variable speeds (5000/12000/18000 RPM), it allows you to adjust and control the polishing speed precisely to meet the power of different scenarios, making your artwork DIY creation a quite easy thing. With different materials like wood, soft metal, plastic, stone, the miracle creation is right on your hands!
【Ergonomic & Compact Design】- Amazingly compact size and rubber wrapped around the body makes the tool easy to grip and control. The keyless chuck promise a simple and tool-free replacement. This makes them perfect not only for a wide range of household tasks, including repairs and maintenance, but also for crafting and hobbies. There are even rotary tool attachments designed to care for pets’ toenails.
【Overload Protection】- The tool body is designed with several vent holes, which helps to dissipate the heat continuously for longer time using. Moreover, the overload protection system would stop the motor in case of unanticipated situations. The groove power button design of this rotary tool help you get rid of worrying about stopping the rotating by touching the switch accidentally.
【ALL-IN-ONE With 43 Accessories】- One little tool for multiple purposes! This rotatory tool come with 43 accessories is perfect for a variety of light-duty handy works. Grinding, polishing, curving, sanding, engraving and more light projects, all your need is this convenient all-in-one tool.
【Fantastic Deal】- 1 x GoGonova 4V Cordless Rotatory Tool; 1 x Storage Box; 43 x Accessories; 1 x USB-C Cable; 1 x Manual.
** KIND REMINDER – This cordless rotary tool is designed for LIGHT-DUTY works only.

  • 15* Sanding Paper & 8* Sanding Bands
  • 5* Cut for Wheels
  • 5* Grinding Stones
  • 5* Diamond Wheel Points
  • 1* Mandrel for Sanding Bands & 1* Mandrel for Cut-off Wheel
  • 1* Hss Cutter, 1* Steel Brush
  • 1* Felt Tip With Shank
  • 1* USB-C Charging Cable

GoGonova 4V Rotary Tool

Why do users stick with GoGonova?

Starting with DIY family, GoGonova has been growing fast and challenging the traditional path of power tools.

Our vision is to empower the imagination through continuous innovation of our technology.

  • Light Weight – 1.2 lbs
  • 3 Speed Adjustments – Up to 18,000 RPM
  • Ergonomic Design – Comfortable Grip
  • Ventilation Mechanism – Smooth Using Experience
  • Multi-Purpose – Kit with 43 accessories available for grinding, engraving, cutting, polishing, sanding, cleaning and more!

Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:46 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Diamond burr set with 1/8″ shank and is compatible with air die grinder and most rotary tools, such as DREMEL, PROXXON, RYOBI and more.The surface is covered with a large amount of diamond grit, when sanding, polishing, carving, engraving and once attached will not easily fall off.Made of carbide steel coated with 60 grit size diamond particles.

Stone carving set with 10 different shaped grinding heads, such as sphere, cone, cylinder, round head cylinder, bullet, flat plate, etc. Different shapes can meet your various engraving and grinding needs.

Diamond bits have high working efficiency, perfect grinding effect, suitable for home improvement, carving, polishing stones, metal, jade and ceramic, DIY craft, craft modeling, a great tool for polishing, grinding, sanding, and more.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.54 x 3.35 x 0.63 inches; 3.53 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 22, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ FOTYBEI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0928BCXYG

【Wide Applications】Diamond grinding burr can be applied to polishing and grinding of glass and metal. It can be used for fine dressing and carving of hard materials such as hardwood, marble, granite, stone, etc.
【60 Grit Diamond】60 grit grinding head with a rougher surface and faster than large grit burrs when sanding, polishing, carving, engraving and once attached will not easily fall off. When used during high speed sanding, diamond bits will result in a smooth, polished surface.
【Different Shapes】The stone carving tool includes 10 different grinding bits, two of each form and of the same grit size. Carving bits come in various shapes including spheres, cones, cylinders, round head cylinders, bullets, and more. The different designs will meet your different requirements. Highly recommended for home improvement and craft, DIY engraving hobbies etc.
【Universal Shank】1/8″ shank diamond burr bits fit most rotary tools and die grinders, such as dremel, proxxon, ryobi, etc. And grinding head is durable and wear resistant. High compatibility and adaptability.
【Quality Assurance】20pcs diamond burr set neatly arranged in a delicate case. Please buy with confidence. If there is any problem with the product, please feel free to contact us and we will be happy to provide you a full refund or replacement. Many thanks for your support!

  1. Diamond burr set with 1/8″ shank and is compatible with air die grinder and most rotary tools, such as DREMEL, PROXXON, RYOBI and more.
  2. The surface is covered with a large amount of diamond grit, when sanding, polishing, carving, engraving and once attached will not easily fall off.
  3. Made of carbide steel coated with 60 grit size diamond particles.

Stone carving set with 10 different shaped grinding heads, such as sphere, cone, cylinder, round head cylinder, bullet, flat plate, etc. Different shapes can meet your various engraving and grinding needs.

Diamond bits have high working efficiency, perfect grinding effect, suitable for home improvement, carving, polishing stones, metal, jade and ceramic, DIY craft, craft modeling, a great tool for polishing, grinding, sanding, and more.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:46 UTC – Details)

Product description CMWDG Wood Carving Drill Bits 20Pcs Set Unlike Any Other:The solid tungsten carbide burr set gives you a massive selection of shapes for all types of cuts, It will leave a smoother finish than single cut burrs due to producing smaller chips as they cut away the material. Used for medium-light stock removal, deburring, finishing, and cleaning. ★Carbide Burr Material:wood carving bits are made from highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand up to time. Package: 20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this rotary grinder burr bit set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping. Box Size: 2.51”x1.73”x0.78” ★ Multi-Purpose Drill bit set for metal precision metalworking, engineering, toolmaking, welding, deburring, jewelry making, or if you enjoy various DIY arts and crafts or hobbies such as wood carving. ★ After Sales Service If you have any questions about our micro drill bit set, please feel free to contact us, we will make sure to resolve all your concerns within 24 business hours.
【Wood Carving Bits】Ideal for precision metalworking, engineering, tool making, welding, deburring, jewelry making, and hobbies such as various DIY arts and crafts or wood carving;wood carving bits are made of highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand the test of time .
【Rotary Tool Accessories Kit】The 20-Piece Wood Drill Bit Kit includes everything you need to cut, shape, grind, polish and remove sharp edges. And is compatible with ferrous and non-ferrous metals, wood, plastic and even stone. The kit includes suitable for all types of cuts such as impellers, cylinders, cylinders, cones and needles.
【Professional Tools】Unlike similar products on the market, these engraved burrs reduce cutting time. Suitable for castings, implant tools, forging and finishing trimming, veining and weld cleaning in a variety of metallic and non-metallic dies.
【Cutting Tool Adaptability】Most die grinders and small rotary tools with three-jaw chucks for precise centering. Wide variety for fine detail work including cutting, engraving, grinding, polishing, trimming, deburring, chamfering, grooving, reaming, hollowing, bevelling, repairing, and Finishing.
【Easy Storage Gift Set】20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this Rotary Grinder Burr Bit Set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping.No more misplacing or losing your bits, they’re always available every time you need them.

Used for medium-light stock removal, deburring, finishing, and cleaning. ★Carbide Burr Material:wood carving bits are made from highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand up to time. Package: 20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this rotary grinder burr bit set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping. Box Size: 2.51”x1.73”x0.78” ★ Multi-Purpose Drill bit set for metal precision metalworking, engineering, toolmaking, welding, deburring, jewelry making, or if you enjoy various DIY arts and crafts or hobbies such as wood carving. ★ After Sales Service If you have any questions about our micro drill bit set, please feel free to contact us, we will make sure to resolve all your concerns within 24 business hours.
【Wood Carving Bits】Ideal for precision metalworking, engineering, tool making, welding, deburring, jewelry making, and hobbies such as various DIY arts and crafts or wood carving;wood carving bits are made of highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand the test of time .
【Rotary Tool Accessories Kit】The 20-Piece Wood Drill Bit Kit includes everything you need to cut, shape, grind, polish and remove sharp edges. And is compatible with ferrous and non-ferrous metals, wood, plastic and even stone. The kit includes suitable for all types of cuts such as impellers, cylinders, cylinders, cones and needles.
【Professional Tools】Unlike similar products on the market, these engraved burrs reduce cutting time. Suitable for castings, implant tools, forging and finishing trimming, veining and weld cleaning in a variety of metallic and non-metallic dies.
【Cutting Tool Adaptability】Most die grinders and small rotary tools with three-jaw chucks for precise centering. Wide variety for fine detail work including cutting, engraving, grinding, polishing, trimming, deburring, chamfering, grooving, reaming, hollowing, bevelling, repairing, and Finishing.
【Easy Storage Gift Set】20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this Rotary Grinder Burr Bit Set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping.No more misplacing or losing your bits, they’re always available every time you need them.
